sentences.en: He who is pregnant with evil and conceives gives birth to disillusionment.
sentences.cn: 试看恶人因奸恶而劬劳.所怀的是毒害,所生的是虚假.

sentences.en: He who is pregnant with evil and conceives trouble gives birth to disillusionment.
sentences.cn: 14试看恶人因奸恶而劬劳.所怀的是毒害,所生的是虚假.
我也是逐渐感到幻想破灭的.

sentences.en: In his gloomy poem " Farewell to love, " we can see his disillusionment.
sentences.cn: 在忧伤的诗作《告别爱情 》 中, 我们就可以感受到他对爱情幻想的破灭.

sentences.en: It was a comfort in her distress and a bulwark against her increasing disillusionment.
sentences.cn: 这是她苦恼中的一种安慰,是对她有增无已的幻灭的一种防御.

sentences.en: NIV He who is pregnant with evil and conceives trouble gives birth to disillusionment.
sentences.cn: 14[和合]试看恶人因奸恶而劬劳,所怀的是21毒害,所22生的是虚假.

sentences.en: Polls have charted growing disillusionment with the campaign.
sentences.cn: 民意调查显示人们对这场运动越来越失望。

sentences.en: Poverty, disillusionment, disease could not still his music.
sentences.cn: 贫困 、 幻灭疾病都不能停息他的音乐.

sentences.en: This state of discontent and disillusionment created a real crisis for the Republic.
sentences.cn: 怨声载道和理想破灭的现状给共和国造成了极为严重的危机.

sentences.en: Two people who experience Disillusionment will usually initiate Power Struggle.
sentences.cn: 共同经历了“幻灭”阶段的两人通常会引发一场力量之争.

sentences.en: You must be prepared for disillusionment.
sentences.cn: 你一定要做好失望的准备.

trans.tran_en: Disillusionment is the disappointment that you feel when you discover that something is not as good as you had expected or thought
